Constructor Detail

Item

public Item(java.lang.String itemName,
            java.lang.String itemShortName,
            java.lang.String itemDescription,
            java.lang.String itemShortDescription,
            java.lang.String itemUseEffect,
            java.lang.String[] itemUsedWith,
            int itemIDX,
            int itemIDY,
            int itemIDZ,
            boolean itemCanTalk,
            java.lang.String[][] itemDialogue)
Creates an Item, all at once.

Parameters:
itemName - the item's full name.
itemShortName - the item's short name.
itemDescription - the item's full description.
itemShortDescription - the item's short description.
itemUseEffect - the effect of using the item.
itemUsedWith - a string array of things the item can be used with.
itemIDX - item's x-coordinate location.
itemIDY - item's y-coordinate location.
itemIDZ - item's z-coordinate location.
itemCanTalk - boolean.
itemDialogue - a 2D string array for dialogue.

            java.lang.String[] itemUsedWith)
Creates an Item, faster.

Parameters:
itemName - the item's full name.
itemIDX - item's x-coordinate location.
itemIDY - item's y-coordinate location.
itemIDZ - item's z-coordinate location.
itemDescription - the item's full description.
itemUseEffect - the effect of using the item.
itemUsedWith - a string array of things the item can be used with.
